name: Frenzy Car Driving Simulation - Free Fun Addictive Street Car Racing Games
name_original: Frenzy Car Driving Simulation - Free Fun Addictive Street Car Racing Games
description:
Get ready to learn Driving on tricky and challenging paths with grea amazing cars and environments of your choice!!

Special KIDS MODE and BABY MODE for kids and babies to enjoy ride with super fun music and sounds!

Drive Carefully and collect coins so you can purchase other cars to ride on and enjoy more challenging levels.

GAME FEATURES:

* Amazing different cars to ride on challenging paths.
* Great game to learn drive.
* Learn driving in different kind of environments e.g Desert, Snow and Grass.
* Many Challenging levels in every environment.
* Daily Bonus of Coins.
* Spin Bonus to get free Coins.
* KIDS MODE
* BABY MODE.

Fun and challenge for all ages!

Please Write a Review and Rate the game to help us making more free cooler games for you!!

Have a nice day!
